channel.title: Exploring technology one step at a time

item.title: revamping the blog
item.description:
Revamping the blog

Yet another effort to revamp the blog. I’ll use this to share news about go-swagger and such I think.

I’m starting the process of rescueing whatever is possible from my previous blog at http://flanders.co.nz. But that will take a little while.

Just wanted to see if I could publish to this site really.
